entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wetaskiwin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Camrose 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16

Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
